QueryDataSource.Name: DataSorce
QueryDataSource.Sql: SELECT (SELECT II.PATIENT_NO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.INPATIENT_NO) BB住院号, (SELECT II.CARD_NO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.INPATIENT_NO) BB就诊卡号, BB.NAME BB姓名, CASE BB.SEX_CODE WHEN 'M' THEN '男' WHEN 'F' THEN '女' END AS BB性别, BB.BIRTHDAY BB出生日期, BB.WEIGHT BB体重, BB.HEIGHT BB身长, BB.DELIVERY_NAME 分娩方式, (SELECT II.PATIENT_NO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) 母亲住院号, (SELECT II.CARD_NO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) 母亲就诊卡号, (SELECT II.NAME FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) 母亲姓名, (SELECT TO_CHAR(II.BIRTHDAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.INPATIENT_NO = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) 母亲出生日期, (SELECT II.IDENNO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.INPATIENT_NO = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) 母亲证件号, (SELECT EE.EMPL_NAME FROM COM_EMPLOYEE EE WHERE EE.EMPL_CODE = BB.OPER_CODE) 登记人姓名, BB.OPER_DATE 登记时间 FROM FIN_IPR_BABYINFO BB --婴儿住院主表 WHERE BB.BIRTHDAY BETWEEN TO_DATE('&dtBeginTime', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('&dtEndTime', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')+1 AND BB.CANCEL_FLAG = '0' --取消标志 AND (SELECT II.PATIENT_NO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) NOT LIKE '%Y%' --月子 AND (SELECT II.PATIENT_NO FROM FIN_IPR_INMAININFO II WHERE II.Inpatient_No = BB.Mother_Inpatient_No) NOT LIKE '%L%' --临时 ORDER BY BB.BIRTHDAY DESC

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\门诊财务报表\爱博恩\分娩量查询设置.xml
